```{r, figure101, fig.cap=' Elanike arvu muutus Eesti maakonnakeskustes, 2000-2017, rahvaarv 01.01 seisuga. 2000=100%', out.width='80%', fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library("tidyverse")
  
 fig101_data <- read.csv ("data/10_fig1_data.csv", header=TRUE, fileEncoding="utf-8")

  fig101_plot <- ggplot(data = fig101_data) +
    geom_col(mapping = aes(x=reorder(county, change), y=change), fill="#BC9417", width=0.7, show.legend = NA) +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0, 20,40, 60, 80, 100)) +
    labs(y="protsent võrreldes aastaga 2000 (%)", x="") + 
    coord_flip ()
  
  fig_theme_general <- theme(aspect.ratio = ,
                     text = element_text(color = "black", size = 16),
                     panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = "white"),
                     panel.grid.major = element_line(colour="#cccccc", size = (0.2)),
                     panel.grid.minor = element_line(size = (0.2), colour="#cccccc"),
                     axis.line = element_line(size = 0.2, colour = "#cccccc"),
                     axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "#cccccc", size=(0.2)),
                     axis.text.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = 10, r = 0, b = 0, l = 0)),
                     axis.text.y = element_text(margin = margin(t = 0, r = 10, b = 0, l = 0)),
                      axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(t = 0, r = 15, b = 0, l = 0)),
                     axis.title.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = 15, r = 0, b = 0, l = 0)),
                      plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm"),
                     legend.position="top"
                 )
  
  print(fig101_plot + fig_theme_general)

```
